title: Bug: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor in Photon, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not display a popup menu for adding breakpoints/marks.
EB: When opening a Java editor in Photon, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should display a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler to access the popup menu. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints/marks, but it is not currently appearing.
